hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Green Rupee# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Slingshot#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Zora Scale#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Deku Shield#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Fire Temple Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##inside Ganon's Castle## has #5# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Heart Container# and #the Biggoron Sword#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle MQ Forest Trial Frozen Eye Switch Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that Barinade, Volvagia and Twinrova hard require the Boomerang, Megaton Hammer and Mirror Shield, respectively?

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Serenade of Water# can be found in #the Market#.
